data.message: I cant get to facebook upgrade has a lock i have another one cant finish filling my profile because i have one with mario cimarro i ask to closed it down and steal there so i have3 Facebook i only one.1 that nees to be upgrade it but i been ignored for very long time

replies.message:
Hey Maria You can learn how to remove or recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2wbjVBD. Please keep in mind that it's against Facebook Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account.  Information on reporting further issues can be found in the Help Center: http://bit.ly/2wFeEW3.  
Additionally, you can report an account to us for review: http://bit.ly/2wuzV4u.
-Tenaya

a facebook büncselekményt követ el a ha kizárja és a személyazonosságukra kötelezi öket joga van minden tagnak a személyazonosságát nem megadni a facebook a szabályzat több pontjában büncselekményt követ el
és az követi a büncselekményt aki fejleszti a facebookot és a facebook html kodja hemzseg a hibás scriptektöl
